page.title: 20LINCOLNSHIRE STANDARD
page.content: Mr. Skelton has been working for the Lincolnshire Standard for 12 years .He has had 3 previous jobs before working for the Standard.He is married but has no children.He is 65 years old and retires on 31.7.85.He works on his own from 7.30 a.m.to midnight.He always carries a notebook around when he goes to an interview. He interviews about {500 people a year.He has photographed {the Queen,the leader of the Red Arrows {and Princess Margaret}.Mr Skelton has written some stories about ghosts.One happened at{THE GROVE}in{WEST ASHBY and another one happened at the{BLACK {SWAN}in{HORNCASTLE.} He has a pretty secretary. His most interesting report was in Belgium about the war graves.Mr Skelton tries to put political news and social disputes on the front page.
